text: This is a list of major rivers in Cambodia . ==By drainage basin== This list is arranged by where the river drains. Tributaries are indented under each larger stream's name. ===South China Sea=== *Saigon River *Mekong **Bassac River (distributary) **Tonlé Sap ***Krang Ponley River ***Boribo River ***Chinit River ****Kambot River (Stung Chinit) ****Slap river ****Tang Krasang River ***Sen River ****Sraka Moan River ****Stung Kambot (Stung Sen) ***Stung Stoung River ****Stung Neang Sa Sngach ***Stung Chickreng River ***Pursat River (Pothisat River) ****Stung Peam ***Moung Russey River ***Stung Roluos ***Siem Reap River ***Stung Kambot (Tonlé Sap) ***Sangker River (Sang Ke River) ****Chas River ****Stung Sreng River ****Stung Battambang River ****Mongkol Borei River *****Stung Pheas River *****Stung Kampong Krasaing *****Sisophon River *****Stung Svay Chek River **Tonlé San ***Kong River ***Srepok River ===Gulf of Thailand=== *Kampong Trak River *Kah Bpow River * Cambodia Cambodia rivers
title: List of rivers of Cambodia
